title: RBI rejects Canara Bank's credit card subsidiary plan
description: The Reserve Bank of India has turned down Canara Bank's proposal to establish a credit card subsidiary. Canara Bank had planned to convert its IT services subsidiary into a credit card unit to boost its card business. The rejection comes amid concerns over the growth of unsecured loans.
